thread.title: Video Of Katrina Kaif, Giving A Haircut To Director Anurag Basu On The Sets Of “Jagga Jasoos”, Is The Monday Motivation You Need
thread.title_full: Video Of Katrina Kaif, Giving A Haircut To Director Anurag Basu On The Sets Of “Jagga Jasoos”, Is The Monday Motivation You Need

title: Video Of Katrina Kaif, Giving A Haircut To Director Anurag Basu On The Sets Of “Jagga Jasoos”, Is The Monday Motivation You Need
text:
facebook 198 SHARES 
Katrina Kaif and Ranbir Kapoor's Jagga Jasoos has been in the news for all the right reasons. From the magical trailer , to Katrina's geek chic style files , the two seem to be rocking it. Add to that the behind the scenes fun which is totally palpable from this video of Katrina giving a haircut to director, Anurag Basu. The five-second video has her chopping off his "locks" while he seems to be shedding a tear. 
Give it a watch, here: Katrina!! The only thing that will save that haircut now is an invisibility cloak... pic.twitter.com/kQ9p5sZjvl
